item.title: Making timelaps photos with ffmpeg on Linux
item.description: Taking a picture with ffmpeg Taking a picture with ffmpeg is relative easy. Her we take a picture with 1080p resolution from the webcam at the /dev/video2 device. ffmpeg -f video4linux2 -s 1920x1080 -i /dev/video2 -vframes 1 picture.jpg Taking pictures at intervals While not perfect, you can make a timelapse with a webcam and ffmpeg to take photos at a set intervall. A while true loop with a sleep command to pause the loop between each image.
